0010111011001000 1110100111111110 1 -> sum: 0001100011000111, cout: 1

0011101010101100 0000001100100101 0 -> sum: 0011110111010001, cout: 0
0010011100101001 0100111110010000 0 -> sum: 0111011010111001, cout: 0
0010010000010000 0110000110001110 0 -> sum: 1000010110011110, cout: 0
